title: Bamboozled Puzzle Game - Complete MVP
description: Build complete Bamboozled puzzle game system with web chat interface, Slack integration, mood system, and AI-powered answer validation. See bamboozled-prd.md for full requirements.

title: Mood Tier System Implementation
description: Implement 7-tier mood system (Skeptic to Worshipper), mood calculation algorithm, tier transitions, notifications (FR-049 to FR-061)

title: Dynamic Response Generation with Claude
description: Implement tier-specific system prompts for Claude, context-aware response generation, variety in responses, emoji escalation

title: Leaderboard and Statistics System
description: Implement weekly and all-time leaderboards, per-user statistics tracking, streak calculations, rankings (FR-035 to FR-039)

title: Celebration System (GIFs and Feedback)
description: Integrate Giphy API for celebratory GIFs, implement correct/incorrect answer feedback, leaderboard display after solve (FR-045 to FR-048)

title: Web Chat UI Components
description: Build ChatWindow, MessageList, MessageInput, PuzzleDisplay, Leaderboard, StatsPanel, MoodIndicator components with shadcn/ui

title: Command System (Slash Commands)
description: Implement /puzzle, /leaderboard, /stats, /alltime, /help, /botmood commands for both Slack and web chat

title: Slack Integration (Optional)
description: Implement Slack bot with @slack/bolt, handle events and commands, webhook signature validation (FR-006 to FR-011)

title: Docker Containerization
description: Create Dockerfile for backend, Dockerfile.web for frontend, docker-compose.yml for orchestration, multi-stage builds

title: Testing Suite
description: Set up testing framework, write unit tests for services, integration tests for API endpoints, E2E tests for web chat

title: Documentation and Deployment Guide
description: Write README with setup instructions, environment variable documentation, deployment guides for AWS ECS/EC2, troubleshooting

title: Project Setup and Infrastructure
description: Initialize project structure, set up monorepo with backend and frontend, configure TypeScript, linting, and Docker

title: AI Provider Abstraction Layer
description: Create abstraction layer for AI providers (Claude, OpenRouter, local models). Support configurable provider via env variable. Implement adapters for each provider with common interface for answer validation and response generation.

title: Backend Framework Setup (Fastify/TypeScript)
description: Set up Node.js backend with Fastify, TypeScript, environment config, logging (pino), error handling, and health check endpoint

title: Database Schema and Setup (SQLite/Kysely)
description: Design and implement database schema with Kysely: users, puzzles, guesses, weekly_leaderboards, mood_history tables. Include migrations and seed data

title: Web Chat Frontend Setup (React/Vite/shadcn)
description: Initialize React/Vite frontend with TypeScript, shadcn/ui components, Tailwind CSS, and basic layout/routing

title: WebSocket Integration for Real-time Chat
description: Implement WebSocket support with @fastify/websocket on backend and socket.io-client on frontend for real-time message exchange

title: Puzzle Management System
description: Implement puzzle loading from JSON, image serving, weekly rotation scheduler, puzzle state tracking (FR-001 to FR-005)

title: User Management System
description: Implement user identification, profile management, session tracking for both Slack and web chat modes (FR-021 to FR-025)

title: Claude API Integration for Answer Validation
description: Integrate @anthropic-ai/sdk, implement fuzzy answer matching with Claude Sonnet 4.5, handle retries and fallbacks (FR-040 to FR-044)
